name: Lonely Woods (Mattman20002)
description:
Think you've got what it takes to delve into to these deep mysterious woods to save your family?

Lonely Woods is a roguelike , retro style game with simple gameplay for new players but enough of a challenge for more experienced gamers. 

Make your way through a random assortment of levels whilst dealing with deadly foes before facing of against the big bad boss.

Lonely woods is the product of Frogsworth studios a group of Priestley College students doing their final project.
